title: the Electricity Costs (Emergency Measures) Domestic Accounts Act 2024 (No.
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Electricity Costs (Emergency Measures)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Electricity Costs (Emergency Measures) 

Domestic Accounts Act 2024 (Commencement) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited electricity cost (emergency measures) domestic account act 2024 (commencement) order 2024

title: the Electricity Costs (Emergency Measures) Domestic Accounts Act 2024 (No.
heading: 2. The 18th day of October 2024 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 18th day of October 2024 is appointed as the day on which the 
Electricity Costs (Emergency Measures) Domestic Accounts Act 2024 (No. 33 
of 2024) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 
17 October, 2024. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for the Environment, 
Climate and Communications. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 18th October, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [540] 3
